string.text: Guys, all who hear me, help me! The military attacked us at the factory.
I was robbed in the courtyard. Help me brothers!
All of my stuff is already placed!
Strelok, the military will not let you just walk away. I told you about Barkeep. He must agree with Dolgovtsev that you can pass through.
Strelok, I have some sad news. Fang died. You did not find him. You should not have gone to the center. However it was up to you to try and find Ghost.
